resources.string: Through respiratory droplets produced when an infected person coughs or sneezes These droplets can land in the mouth or noses of people who are nearby or possibly inhaled into lungs
Through close contact with COVIDâ€“19 infected person approximately withing 2 metres 0 6 feet or 2-3 steps.
By touching objects and surfaces contaminated by Coronavirus and then touching the mouth, nose or eyes.
Cough or sneeze into a diposables tissue or bent elbow, and wash hands immediately. Dispose the tissue in a trash or burn it
Avoid shaking hands and maintain 6ft distance from people.
Person with a cough or sneezing should stay home or keep a social distance and avoid mixing with others
Self quarantine is an act of individuals who may have been exposed to COVID-19 separating themselves for 14 days to monitor if the developed symptoms are gone.
Anyone who has traveled within the past 14 days to a country with sustained reported COVID-19 cases or has had close contact with a person showing COVID-19 symptoms.
